cookies-intro: At kpucha.dev, we use cookies to personalize your online experience and analyze website usage. This policy explains how we use cookies and the choices you have regarding their use.

cookies-contents.what: Cookies are small text files that are stored on your device when you visit a website. They allow the website to recognize your browser and remember your preferences, such as language settings, login information, and shopping cart items. Cookies also help website owners analyze how visitors interact with their website and improve their website's performance.
cookies-contents.types: We use the following types of cookies on kpucha.dev:
cookies-contents.types-essential: Essential cookies: These cookies are necessary for the website to function properly and cannot be disabled. They enable basic functions such as page navigation and access to secure areas of the website.
cookies-contents.types-performance: Performance cookies: These cookies help us understand how visitors interact with our website by collecting information such as which pages are visited most frequently and whether visitors receive error messages. They do not collect any personally identifiable information.
cookies-contents.types-advertising: Advertising cookies: These cookies are used to deliver targeted advertisements based on your browsing behavior and interests. They can be used by third-party advertisers to show ads on other websites.
cookies-contents.types-analytics: Analytics cookies: These cookies are used to collect information about how visitors use our website. We use this information to compile reports and improve our website. These cookies are placed by third-party analytics providers such as Google Analytics.
cookies-contents.managing-info: You can choose to accept or reject cookies on kpucha.dev by adjusting your browser settings. Most browsers automatically accept cookies, but you can usually modify your browser settings to decline cookies if you prefer. However, if you choose to decline cookies, some website features may not function properly.
cookies-contents.managing-info2: You can also opt-out of receiving targeted advertising from third-party advertisers by visiting the Digital Advertising Alliance opt-out page (http://optout.aboutads.info/) or the Network Advertising Initiative opt-out page (http://www.networkadvertising.org/choices/).
cookies-contents.updates: We reserve the right to update this cookie policy at any time and without prior notice. You will be notified of any significant changes to our cookie policy by posting the revised policy on our website.
cookies-contents.contact: If you have any questions or concerns about our cookie policy, please contact us through our contact form on our website.
cookies-contents.law: This cookie policy is governed by the laws of Spain, and any disputes arising from it will be resolved through binding arbitration in accordance with the International Commercial Arbitration Rules of Spain.
